tool.seo-keyword-research.name: Keyword Research
tool.seo-keyword-research.desc: Discover high-traffic, low-competition keywords to rank on Google and drive targeted organic traffic

tool.seo-meta-tags.desc: Create SEO-optimized title tags and meta descriptions that maximize click-through rates from search results

tool.copywriting-headlines.desc: Generate high-converting headlines using proven copywriting formulas and psychological triggers
tool.social-media-captions.name: Social Media Captions
tool.social-media-captions.desc: Create platform-native captions for Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook and TikTok that boost engagement

tool.email-campaign.desc: Build complete email sequences ‚Äî welcome flows, product launches, re-engagement ‚Äî that convert subscribers into customers

tool.market-analysis.desc: Get a deep-dive market research report with TAM/SAM/SOM sizing, growth drivers, customer segments and strategic recommendations
tool.competitor-research.name: Competitor Research
tool.competitor-research.desc: Map your competitive landscape with detailed profiles, feature comparison matrices, battle cards and positioning strategy
tool.swot-analysis.name: SWOT Analysis
tool.swot-analysis.desc: Go beyond a simple SWOT with advanced TOWS strategies, a priority action matrix and a risk heat map

tool.google-ads.desc: Build full Google Ads campaigns with ad groups, keyword lists, responsive search ads, extensions and an optimization roadmap
tool.meta-ads.name: Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram)
tool.meta-ads.desc: Design complete Facebook & Instagram campaigns with audience targeting, ad copy variations, retargeting and a testing framework
tool.landing-page.name: Landing Page Copy
tool.landing-page.desc: Write conversion-optimized copy for every section ‚Äî hero, benefits, social proof, FAQs and final CTA

tool.product-description.name: Product Description Writer

tool.cro-audit.desc: Get a full CRO audit with prioritized A/B tests, quick wins, psychological trigger checklist and a 90-day roadmap

tool.investor-pitch.name: Investor Pitch Deck
